segments.text: I've heard that you are going to call for a tender . What kind of goods would you like to buy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we're ready to start the invitation to tender . You're well informed . We'd like to build new factory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you open the tender ? And where ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We intend to open the tender at first next month in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when is the closing date ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The time period is set on June 29th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you please tell me something more about the conditions for the tender ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . The area of the factory buildings is around 8,000 square meters . You can read the details in the invitations which will be sent tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to have taken up too much of your time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter . We'll be in touch .
segments.speaker: S2
